content.raw:
@{557058:42fc2023-4935-4b2e-8079-075649866124} The Docker files were recently updated to install the new required `ros-melodic-ros1-ign` bridge \(PR [#183](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/183/docker-install-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge/diff)\). You need it for the `CameraInfo` and others to work. You can either get the [latest one](#!/osrf/subt/src/tunnel_circuit/docker/subt_shell/Dockerfile) or run the command below inside your docker container. Then, try running simulation again.

`sudo apt-get install -y ros-melodic-ros1-ign && sudo apt-get clean`
content.html:
@baila The Docker files were recently updated to install the new required ros-melodic-ros1-ign bridge (PR #183). You need it for the CameraInfo and others to work. You can either get the latest one or run the command below inside your docker container. Then, try running simulation again.

sudo apt-get install -y ros-melodic-ros1-ign && sudo apt-get clean
